about_the_game:
Is there ray tracing technology just for AAA-class games?

no!

Nowadays, you can easily create ray tracing compatible games using Unity.

Isn't it okay to use ray tracing in a simple mini-game?

With that in mind, I made 10 crispy pieces.


Game content
1. Whac-A-Mole
2. Breakout
3. Car protection game
4. Air hockey (2P match: up to 20 people connected at the same time)
5. Snake game
6. Run game
7. Chicken race
8. Wall protection game
9. Cat jump
10. Zombie protection game

You can play with the above games.

6. Run game
Has experimentally enabled you to play Youtube videos.
Folder under the installation folder
SimpleRayTracingMiniGame_Data \ StreamingAssets
It is in,
musics.txt
You can play with various videos by editing.
Video URL, _, time group
As for the time group, the time of the tapped timing will be accumulated in the edit box displayed when you press the E key during this game, so copy it.

During the game, there are the following hidden functions.
P key ray tracing ON / OFF
F key frame rate display ON / OFF
N key down resolution
M key up resolution

We have implemented it all over, but we plan to upgrade it in the future.
2021/6/25
Supports DLSS!
After upgrading, it will start in full screen.
(The GTX 1080 runs in about 30 frames.)
detailed_description:
Is there ray tracing technology just for AAA-class games?

no!

Nowadays, you can easily create ray tracing compatible games using Unity.

Isn't it okay to use ray tracing in a simple mini-game?

With that in mind, I made 10 crispy pieces.


Game content
1. Whac-A-Mole
2. Breakout
3. Car protection game
4. Air hockey (2P match: up to 20 people connected at the same time)
5. Snake game
6. Run game
7. Chicken race
8. Wall protection game
9. Cat jump
10. Zombie protection game

You can play with the above games.

6. Run game
Has experimentally enabled you to play Youtube videos.
Folder under the installation folder
SimpleRayTracingMiniGame_Data \ StreamingAssets
It is in,
musics.txt
You can play with various videos by editing.
Video URL, _, time group
As for the time group, the time of the tapped timing will be accumulated in the edit box displayed when you press the E key during this game, so copy it.

During the game, there are the following hidden functions.
P key ray tracing ON / OFF
F key frame rate display ON / OFF
N key down resolution
M key up resolution

We have implemented it all over, but we plan to upgrade it in the future.
2021/6/25
Supports DLSS!
After upgrading, it will start in full screen.
(The GTX 1080 runs in about 30 frames.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • OS: Windows10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: I tried to make 10 common simple mini games with the latest technology and ray tracing! 2021/6/25　Supports DLSS!　full screen.The GTX 1080 runs in about 30 frames.
